a1.text: Welcome to our game. Please choose a door.

a2.text: You chose the first door. Please continue. 

b2.text: You chose the second door. Please continue

c2.text: You chose the third door. Please continue

a3.text: You chose the first door. This is the end of the line, son.

b3.text: You chose the second door. This is the end of the line, son.

c3.text: You chose the third door. This is the end of the line, son.
